title: President offers Eid prayer with complete SOPs
content:
KARACHI, May 13 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Thursday offered Eid ul Fitr prayer with complete adherence to the Covid-19 standard operating procedures (SOPs).
The president along with Governor Sindh Imran Ismail and a limited number of people offered namaz in an open place adjacent to the Governor House,
During prayers, strict adherence to SOPs including distancing in rows and wearing of masks were observed.
